description: This file defines a UI component called 'NoteCard' using Lightning.js framework, which displays note details such as title, summary, creation date, and includes delete functionality.

methods.name: onClick
methods.description: Emits a 'select' event when the note card is clicked, indicating that the note has been selected for viewing.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Emits a 'delete' event to the parent component, signaling that the note should be deleted.

methods.name: formatDate
methods.description: Formats a timestamp into a locale string for display.
